testcase.name: upload multiple fields
testcase.system-out: * url demoBaseUrl ......................................................... passed Given path 'files', 'fields' .............................................. passed And multipart fields { message: 'hello world', json: { foo: 'bar' } } ..... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == { message: 'hello world', json: { foo: 'bar' } } .... passed
